tricks.name: Korean Roll
description: Keep your legs together
Both hands grab the line in front of you

tricks.name: Sofa Roll
description: If you fall into a backlever position try to not hold on to the line in order to save your shoulders

tricks.name: Richy Roll
description: Swing one leg over the line as soon as you start rotating sideways

tricks.name: Down To Sofa
description: Let your feet come towards your body, grab the line and then let your feet go

tricks.name: Up From Sofa
description: Get one foot on the line and let go with the arm on the same side. Then press yourself up with this foot and the other hand and get your second foot on the line

tricks.name: Up From Sofa (No Hands)
description: Get one foot on the line then shift your bodyweight to this side and get your other foot on the line to press yourself up.

tricks.name: Rocket Mount
description: Get some momentum with your legs in the bottom part of the bounce. As soon as you are weightless pull the line below your feet. Then stick it!

tricks.name: Panic Roll
description: Sit in Sofa position grab the line to the side of you with hands facing behind you. On the way up dive down where your hands are and roll around the line. Land in Chest position.

tricks.name: Panic Roll To Feet
description: During the roll get your far foot on the line. At the end of the roll get your second foot up on the line. Stick it!

tricks.name: Jump To Richy
description: Start in korean, then get one foot over the line in a powerful way and regrab the line with the far hand to allow the transition to the sofa roll.

tricks.name: Obi Wan
description: From hanging use the bounce to get your feet up to the line and mantle in the same bounce

tricks.name: Belly Flop to Feet / JarJar Roll
description: Turn one time around the line (on your belly) and get to exposure in one bounce

tricks.name: Buck Nasty
description: Sick Nasty with an aditional Back Sofa Roll in the same bounce

tricks.name: HipHop Bounce
description: reach down to one side with your hand (into a side plank position) and stand up again in the same bounce

tricks.name: Turtle Roll (double Yoda Roll)
description: tuck hard and roll

tricks.name: Sofa Roll 360
description: do a Sofa Roll, while twisting also around your Body axis

tricks.name: Backroll to Feet
description: just do it

tricks.name: Back Magic
description: Back Roll directly into Backbounce

tricks.name: Flowflip
description: Grab the line behind your back and let yourself fall backwards. The rest happens by magic!

tricks.name: Flowflip To Feet
description: During the flip get your far foot on the line. At the end of the flip get your second foot up on the line. Stick it!
